items.title: Coconut, Oat, and Almond Raw Cakes
items.descript: Cinnamon, banana, and strawberry. Served with maple syrup and cashew butter.

items.title: Mango and Rose Water Chia Pudding
items.descript: Pumpkin seed milk topped with fresh fruit. Your choice between local raw honey or organic agave.

items.title: Mushroom Sandwich
items.descript: Flax and carrot bread, garlic cream, cashew cheese, spinach, and avocado. Served with a huge garden salad.

items.title: Collard Green Wraps
items.descript: Three collard leaves stuffed with sunflower and beet “meat” avocado, carrots and spinach topped with sunflower cream. Served with a huge garden salad.

items.title: Granola
items.descript: Oats, walnuts, and maple syrup. Served with fruit. Your choice between european yogurt, goat yogurt, or almond milk.

items.title: Eden's Waffles
items.descript: Oat, chickpea and fava bean ﬂour. Along with cinnamon and vanilla.
items.listdescript: Available waffle toppings are: Fresh fruit, peanut butter, pumpkin seeds, sunﬂower seeds, goji berries, chocolate chips, coconut, bee pollen, golden berries, or almond butter.

items.title: Strawberry Stuffed Chick Pea Pancake
items.descript: Cinnamon, ginger, and strawberries. Served with cashew butter and maple syrup.

menulist.title: savory
menulist.note: with your choice of fresh fruit, side salad, or soup of the day.

items.title: Omelettes of the Day
items.descript: Three local organic eggs with seasonal ﬁllings. Served with gluten free & vegan toast.

items.title: Coconut Chickpea Burger
items.descript: Mango cashew cream and spinach. Served on a gluten free bun. Choose between cashew cheese or goat cheese.

items.title: Jack Fruit Crab Salad Sandwich
items.descript: Arugula, tomato, and avocado. Served on gluten free & vegan bread.
items.listdescript: add a fried egg or goat cheese $1

items.title: Vegetable Scramble
items.descript: An assortment of vegetables, black eyed peas, and avocado. With either three local and organic eggs or Eden’s tofu eggs. Gluten free & vegan toast or corn tortillas are also available.
items.listdescript: add cashew cheese or goat cheese for an extra $1

items.title: Cauliflower and Collard Green Tacos
items.descript: Chili spiced tomato sauce, pickled onions, cashew cheese, and avocado. Served with cashew sour cream.

items.title: Indian Spiced Egg
items.descript: Three eggs scrambled with indian spices, chick peas, goat cheese, and arugula. Served with gluten free & vegan toast.

items.title: Super Green Salad
items.descript: Kale, spinach, wakame seaweed, collards and lettuce with carrots, cucumbers, and red pepper. Served with a sesame and ginger vinaigrette, toasted peanuts, and gluten free & vegan toast.
items.listdescript: add tofu, tempeh, fried egg $2 -Or also add cashew cheese or goat cheese $1

items.title: Garden Salad
items.descript: Baby greens, kale, carrots, peppers, cucumber, tomato, pumpkin seeds, balsamic vinaigrette, and avocado. Served with gluten free & vegan toast.
items.listdescript: add tofu, tempeh, fried egg $2 -Or also add cashew cheese or goat cheese $1
